channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Both crossing buttons not working, 22nd September
item.description:
The crossing button outside the post office is not working and the crossing button outside elmers kebab shop is tempremental. pedestrians now make the traffic stop to be able to cross.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Elmers End Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The contractors working on the new housing development on the High Street have left a disgraceful mess behind the gardens, clearly visible from Mill Brook Road. It looks absolutely awful and shows a complete lack of respect for the local community!, 22nd September
item.description:
